title: City and Transportation 2
sentences: The bridge leads over the river.
Ich muss mein Fahrrad am Bahnhof
I have to lock my bicycle at the station.
The platform is very crowded today.
Where is the nearest ATM located?
Wir gehen heute Abend in das kleine
We are going to the small cinema tonight.
The city hall is a very old building.
At the next intersection we drive to the left.
I parked my car in the parking garage.
Is there a bicycle path here?
The harbor is especially beautiful at night.
Ich muss mein Handy an der
I have to charge my phone at the charging station.
fährt jeden Tag mit dem Zug.
The commuter travels by train every day.
darf man nur in eine Richtung befahren.
The one-way street may only be driven in one direction.
We are meeting at the fountain on the market square.
Where is the entrance to the museum?
Please use the exit on the right side.
The construction site is causing a lot of traffic jam.
There is a lot of traffic on the streets.
I am waiting at the counter for my ticket.
The tunnel is two kilometers long.
Do you have a parking disc in the car?
The sidewalk is very narrow here.
We cross the square in front of the church.
The subway station is directly beneath us.
Have a good trip and arrive safely!
dictionary:
die Brücke - bridge
abschließen - to lock
der Bahnsteig - platform
der Geldautomat - ATM
das Kino - cinema
das Rathaus - city hall
die Kreuzung - intersection
das Parkhaus - parking garage
der Radweg - bicycle path
der Hafen - harbor
die Ladestation - charging station
der Pendler - commuter
die Einbahnstraße - one-way street
der Brunnen - fountain
der Eingang - entrance
der Ausgang - exit
die Baustelle - construction site
der Verkehr - traffic
der Schalter - counter / window
der Tunnel - tunnel
die Parkscheibe - parking disc
der Bürgersteig - sidewalk
der Platz - square / place
die U-Bahn-Station - subway station
die Reise - journey / trip
